game.name: 蝶のいる部屋 ｜ The Room With The Butterfly
game.categories: Single-player, Mouse Only Option, Playable without Timed Input
game.shortDescription: All you do is talk to a butterfly. A very short horror game. Enjoy the story through simple click-only controls.
game.shortDescriptionEn: All you do is talk to a butterfly. A very short horror game. Enjoy the story through simple click-only controls.
